mapper.select: SELECT sub.frno AS `no`, sub.parent_reply AS `parent_reply`, sub.content AS `content`, sub.write_date AS `write_date`, sub.writer_uno AS `writer_uno`, sub.writer_nick_name AS `writer_nick_name`, sub.writer_profile_pic AS `writer_profile_pic`, sub.like_num AS `like_num`, sub.reply_num AS `reply_num`, liker.uno AS `liker_uno`, liker.nick_name AS `liker_nick_name` FROM ( SELECT * FROM `feed_reply_view` WHERE `fno` = #{no} AND `parent_reply` IS NULL ORDER BY `like_num` DESC LIMIT ${start} , 20 ) sub LEFT OUTER JOIN `feed_reply_like` l ON sub.frno = l.frno LEFT OUTER JOIN `user` liker ON l.uno = liker.uno ORDER BY `no` , `like_num` DESC;

SELECT sub.frno AS `no`, sub.parent_reply AS `parent_reply`, sub.content AS `content`, sub.write_date AS `write_date`, sub.writer_uno AS `writer_uno`, sub.writer_nick_name AS `writer_nick_name`, sub.writer_profile_pic AS `writer_profile_pic`, sub.like_num AS `like_num`, liker.uno AS `liker_uno`, liker.nick_name AS `liker_nick_name` FROM ( SELECT * FROM `feed_reply_view` WHERE `parent_reply` = #{no} ORDER BY `like_num` DESC LIMIT ${start} , 20 ) sub LEFT OUTER JOIN `feed_reply_like` l ON sub.frno = l.frno LEFT OUTER JOIN `user` liker ON l.uno = liker.uno ORDER BY `no` , `like_num` DESC;
